Package com.example.ex4

Class APIController

java.lang.Object
com.example.ex4.APIController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api") public class APIController extends Object
A controller for all api methods

  • Method Details

    • update

      @GetMapping("/chat/update") HashMap<String,​Object> update()
      Provides the current state of the chatroom.
      Returns:
      "users" - a list of ChatUsers and "messages" - a list of Messages

    • thisFunctionNeedsPost

      @GetMapping("/chat/send-message") String thisFunctionNeedsPost​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Get handler for illegal get requests. Sets the response code to BAD_REQUEST (400).
      Parameters:
      response - the response to the client
      Returns:
      an error message.

    • sendMessage

      @PostMapping(value="/chat/send-message", consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") String sendMessage​(@RequestBody Message message, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws IOException
      Handler for the send-message path. If the user is logged in, the message is recorded.
      Parameters:
      message - the message given
      response - the response to the client
      Returns:
      an error/success message
      Throws:
      IOException - if redirect fails

    • searchByUsername

      @GetMapping("/search/username/{username}") List<Message> searchByUsername​(@PathVariable String username)
      Handler for the /search/username/{username} path.
      Parameters:
      username - searching for all messages by username
      Returns:
      all messages by username

    • searchByTextInMessage

      @GetMapping("/search/message/{textInMessage}") List<Message> searchByTextInMessage​(@PathVariable String textInMessage)
      Handler for the /search/message/{textInMessage} path.
      Parameters:
      textInMessage - searching for all messages containing textInMessage
      Returns:
      all messages containing textInMessage

    • logout

      @GetMapping("/chat/logout") String logout​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws IOException
      Handler for the logout path.
      Parameters:
      request - the request from the client
      response - the response to the client
      Returns:
      a message
      Throws:
      IOException - if redirect fails
